title: AMAZING!
review: Tim Burton classic! No more words need to be said.

title: Great movie
review: Can't believe the score, it must be 10 out of 10. Everything is perfect, as a whole perfect. A movie of 1990 and can be watched even in 2050. It's not limited to a particular period of time. Just amazing. I have no other words to say.

title: good

title: Legend
review: This is a classic! This is one the best movies combining horror with fun. The gothic and dark type of jokes. Gives you a very different viewpoint to life and everything.
